name: Nelke & the Legendary Alchemists ~Ateliers of the New World~ / ネルケと伝説の錬金術士たち ～新たな大地のアトリエ～
description: Atelier 20th Anniversary Title An Atelier town built together with legendary alchemists. This title aims to combine the “slice-of-life” atmosphere of living in a town and collaborating with various characters and the exaltation that comes from successfully governing a town and expanding your world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7/8.1/10 64bit Processor: Core i5 2.6GHz (4 core) or over Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1280x720 NVIDIA GeForce GTX660 2GB DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 35 GB available space Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 7/8.1/10 64bit Processor: Core i7 3.4GHz (4 core) or over Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 1920x1080 NVIDIA GeForce GTX1060 2GB DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 35 GB available space Sound Card: 16bit Stereo, 48kHz WAVE file can be played
